document.discussion_title: Person shot in head in N. Spokane,...
document.topic_text: Person shot in head in N. Spokane, expected to survive Staff , KREM 10:36 PM. PDT August 21, 2016 Shooting at Al's Motel SPOKANE, Wash. – Police say a person was shot in the head in North Spokane Sunday night but is expected to survive. Officials said it happened at Al’s Motel on Division around 9:45 p.m. Police said they were still searching for the shooter as of 10:30 p.m. They believe this was not a random shooting and there is no threat to the public. KREM
